text: Roberto Hern치ndez Prendes (6 March 1967 - 5 July 2021)Roberto Hern치ndez's obituary was a Cuban track and field sprinter who specialized in the 400 metres. He was born in Limonar, Matanzas. He won an Olympic Silver medal in 1992. Hern치ndez died of problems caused by heart disease in Havana on 5 July 2021, aged 54. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Olympic medalists for Cuba Category:Sprinters Category:Olympic silver medalists Category:Deaths from heart disease
